title: Error decoding ENRs from mainnet/bootstrap_nodes.txt

labels.name: meta-bug
labels.description: Issues that identify a bug and require a fix.

body:
### Describe the bug

Last week a PR was merged (https://github.com/eth-clients/eth2-networks/pull/86) that added IP and location information to bootnodes.

This causes the following error on Lodestar when adding the `--network.connectToDiscv5Bootnodes` flag on a mainnet node.

```
âœ– Error: invalid remainder
    at Module.decode (/home/nico/projects/ethereum/lodestar/node_modules/rlp/src/index.ts:75:11)
    at decode (file:///home/nico/projects/ethereum/lodestar/node_modules/@chainsafe/discv5/src/enr/enr.ts:157:31)
    at Function.decodeTxt (file:///home/nico/projects/ethereum/lodestar/node_modules/@chainsafe/discv5/src/enr/enr.ts:350:37)
    at getDiscv5Multiaddrs (file:///home/nico/projects/ethereum/lodestar/packages/beacon-node/src/network/libp2p/index.ts:28:21)
    at createNodeJsLibp2p (file:///home/nico/projects/ethereum/lodestar/packages/beacon-node/src/network/libp2p/index.ts:56:50)
    at Function.init (file:///home/nico/projects/ethereum/lodestar/packages/beacon-node/src/network/core/networkCore.ts:141:20)
    at Function.init (file:///home/nico/projects/ethereum/lodestar/packages/beacon-node/src/network/network.ts:150:9)
    at Function.init (file:///home/nico/projects/ethereum/lodestar/packages/beacon-node/src/node/nodejs.ts:228:21)
    at Object.beaconHandler [as handler] (file:///home/nico/projects/ethereum/lodestar/packages/cli/src/cmds/beacon/handler.ts:75:18)
```

The values passed to `ENR.decodeTxt`

https://github.com/ChainSafe/lodestar/blob/67b6e79bc6abcdfc864f0ab4800b66c578a718fd/packages/beacon-node/src/network/libp2p/index.ts#L27

look like below, which explains why decoding fails

```
'enr:-LK4QKWrXTpV9T78hNG6s8AM6IO4XH9kFT91uZtFg1GcsJ6dKovDOr1jtAAFPnS2lvNltkOGA9k29BUN7lFh_sjuc9QBh2F0dG5ldHOIAAAAAAAAAACEZXRoMpC1MD8qAAAAAP__________gmlkgnY0gmlwhANAdd-Jc2VjcDI1NmsxoQLQa6ai7y9PMN5hpLe5HmiJSlYzMuzP7ZhwRiwHvqNXdoN0Y3CCI4yDdWRwgiOM # 364117223 | aws-eu-central-1-frankfurt'
```



### Expected behavior

Decoding ENRs from bootnodes file (`shared/mainnet/bootstrap_nodes.txt`) should not throw an error.

### Steps to reproduce

Start Lodestar with `--network=mainnet` and `--network.connectToDiscv5Bootnodes` flag.

### Additional context

Related PR that causes the issue
- https://github.com/eth-clients/eth2-networks/pull/86

### Operating system

Linux

### Lodestar version or commit hash

v1.9.2 and unstable (67b6e79bc6abcdfc864f0ab4800b66c578a718fd)
